title: Ewatchparts 22MM LEATHER WATCH BAND STRAP DEPLOYMENT CLASP COMPATIBLE WITH MONTBLANC TIMEWALKER BLACK
features: USE A RULER TO MEASURE YOUR STRAP WIDTH OR CASE OPENING IN MM before purchasing to avoid returns as all models vary in size. We have a measurement guide in the image gallery to assist you if needed.
BAND MATERIAL: Genuine Italian Leather; BAND WIDTH: 22mm; BAND COLOR: Black; STRAP LENGTH: 115mm ( 4.6 inches) x 75mm ( 3 inches);
GENERIC replacement watch part - NO markings or logo
description: The item for sale is a brand new genuine cow leather strap made of the finest top quality American alligator belly grain leather with deployment clasp made particular for this high end watch. It will fit your Montblanc watch which has 22mm lugs.This Strap is made of premium top high quality genuine leather of 5mm padding with heavy duty detailed black thread stitching and with genuine nubuck waterproof leather lining on the backside of the strap with sweat resistant for long lasting and durability of the strap with extra comfort and classy look.It will fit your watch up to an 8-8 1/2 inch wrist, depending on your watch size.Your strap comes with brushed finished deployment clasp made of 316L stainless steel. You can interchange the clasp with your original clasp. Length:Long part: 115mmShort part: 75mmThickness at Lugs: 5mmThickness at buckle: 2.5mmWidth of strap: 22/20mm. You will get complete sets of genuine leather strap with deployment clasp.You will get 2 tubes free of charge with the straps.Available other styles in 20mm, 22mm and 24mm in black, blue, brown, beige for this and many other model watches and they are listed in our store for you to purchase.All Customers Please Note: Be sure to check your watch model number and the lug width opening using the mm side of a ruler and make sure it matches the lug width mentioned in the description of our listing.
